mapper.sql: BOOKING.ID BOOKING_ID, BOOKING.USER_ID BOOKING_USERID, BOOKING.COURSE_ID BOOKING_COURSEID, BOOKING.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID BOOKING_COURSETEMPLATEID, BOOKING.REFERENCE BOOKING_REFERENCE, BOOKING.NAME BOOKING_NAME, BOOKING.PHONE BOOKING_PHONE, BOOKING.EMAIL BOOKING_EMAIL, BOOKING.STATUS BOOKING_STATUS, BOOKING.SCHEDULED_TIME BOOKING_SCHEDULEDTIME, BOOKING.NO_REFUND_DATE BOOKING_NOREFUNDDATE, BOOKING.CASHBACK_DATE BOOKING_CASHBACKDATE, BOOKING.PRICE BOOKING_PRICE, BOOKING.TYPE BOOKING_TYPE, BOOKING.NOTE BOOKING_NOTE, BOOKING.CASHBACK_AMOUNT BOOKING_CASHBACKAMOUNT, BOOKING.LAST_MODIFY_TIME BOOKING_LASTMODIFYTIME, BOOKING.CREATE_TIME BOOKING_CREATETIME, BOOKING.ENABLED BOOKING_ENABLED, BOOKING.DELETED BOOKING_DELETED, BOOKING.PARTNER_ID BOOKING_PARTNERID

COURSE.ID COURSE_ID, COURSE.COURSE_NAME COURSE_COURSENAME, COURSE.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID COURSE_COURSETEMPLATEID, COURSE.CATEGORY_ID COURSE_CATEGORYID, COURSE.LOCATION_ID COURSE_LOCATIONID, COURSE.CIRCLE_ID COURSE_CIRCLEID, COURSE.PARTNER_ID COURSE_PARTNERID, COURSE.ADDRESS_ID COURSE_ADDRESSID, COURSE.PRICE COURSE_PRICE, COURSE.ORIGINAL_PRICE COURSE_ORIGINALPRICE, COURSE.CASHBACK COURSE_CREATETIME, COURSE.ENABLED COURSE_ENABLED, COURSE.DELETED COURSE_DELETED, COURSE.COURSE_HOUR_LENGTH COURSE_COURSEHOURLENGTH, COURSE.TEACHING_METHOD COURSE_TEACHINGMETHOD, COURSE.TEACHING_MATERIAL_FEE COURSE_TEACHINGMATERIALFEE, COURSE.DOWNLOAD_MATERIALS COURSE_DOWNLOADMATERIALS, COURSE.BONUS_SERVICE COURSE_BONUSSERVICE, COURSE.MARKING COURSE_MARKING, COURSE.ASSIGNMENTS COURSE_ASSIGNMENTS, COURSE.TRAIL COURSE_TRAIL, COURSE.QUESTION_SESSION COURSE_QUESTIONSESSION, COURSE.TEACHING_AND_EXERCISE COURSE_TEACHINGANDEXERCISE, COURSE.CLASS_TEACHER COURSE_CLASSTEACHER, COURSE.GOAL COURSE_GOAL, COURSE.OUTLINE COURSE_OUTLINE, COURSE.REG_PHONE COURSE_REGPHONE, COURSE.CONTACT COURSE_CONTACT, COURSE.EXTRACURRICULAR COURSE_EXTRACURRICULAR, COURSE.PASS_AGREEMENT COURSE_PASSAGREEMENT, COURSE.QUALITY_ASSURANCE COURSE_QUALITYASSURANCE, COURSE.QUESTION_BANK COURSE_QUESTIONBANK, COURSE.TEACHING_MATERIAL_INTRO COURSE_TEACHINGMATERIALINTRO, COURSE.STUDY_DAYS_NOTE COURSE_STUDYDAYSNOTE, COURSE.HIGH_SCORE_REWARD COURSE_HIGHSCOREREWARD, COURSE.PREREQUEST COURSE_PREREQUEST, COURSE.SUITABLE_STUDENT COURSE_SUITABLESTUDENT, COURSE.OPEN_COURSE_REQUIREMENT COURSE_OPENCOURSEREQUIREMENT, COURSE.CERTIFICATION COURSE_CERTIFICATION, COURSE.QUIZ COURSE_QUIZ, COURSE.COURSE_INTRO COURSE_COURSEINTRO, COURSE.REFERENCE COURSE_REFERENCE, COURSE.REG_ADDRESS_ID COURSE.START_UPON_ARRIVAL COURSE_STARTUPONARRIVAL, COURSE.BOOKING_TYPE COURSE_BOOKINGTYPE, COURSE.CASHBACK_DATE COURSE_CASHBACKDATE, COURSE.NO_REFUND_DATE COURSE_NOREFUNDDATE, COURSE.CUTOFF_DATE COURSE_CUTOFFDATE, COURSE.FINISH_DATE COURSE_FINISHDATE, COURSE.START_DATE COURSE_STARTDATE, COURSE.POPULARITY COURSE_POPULARITY, COURSE.CLASS_SIZE COURSE_CLASSSIZE, COURSE.COURSE_HOUR_NUM PARTNER.LOGO_URL PARTNER_LOGOURL, PARTNER.WHOLE_NAME PARTNER_WHOLENAME, PARTNER.INST_NAME PARTNER_INSTNAME, PARTNER.PARTNER_INTRO PARTNER_INTRO, PARTNER.PARTNER_QUALIFICATION PARTNER_PARTNERQUALIFICATION, PARTNER.PARTNER_DISTINCTION PARTNER_PARTNERDISTINCTION, PARTNER.RATING PARTNER_RATING

mapper.insert:
insert into BOOKING
USER_ID,
COURSE_ID,
COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID ,
REFERENCE,
NAME,
PHONE,
EMAIL,
STATUS,
SCHEDULED_TIME,
NO_REFUND_DATE,
CASHBACK_DATE,
PRICE,
TYPE,
NOTE,
CASHBACK_AMOUNT,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
ENABLED,
PARTNER_ID,
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{courseTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{scheduledTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{noRefundDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{cashbackDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cashbackAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update BOOKING
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSE_ID = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID = #{courseTemplateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REFERENCE = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SCHEDULED_TIME = #{scheduledTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
NO_REFUND_DATE = #{noRefundDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CASHBACK_DATE = #{cashbackDate,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASHBACK_AMOUNT = #{cashbackAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from BOOKING where DELETED = 0

SELECT , , , ,
from BOOKING left join COURSE on BOOKING.COURSE_ID = COURSE.ID left join PARTNER ON COURSE.PARTNER_ID = PARTNER.ID left join ADDRESS ADDRESS ON ADDRESS.ID = COURSE.ADDRESS_ID left join (select COURSE.ID COURSE_ID, from COURSE left join ADDRESS ADDRESS ON ADDRESS.ID = COURSE.ADDRESS_ID) temp on COURSE.ID = temp.COURSE_ID where BOOKING.DELETED = 0 and BOOKING.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
